title: RaptorKarr's never gonna give up that useless ship...
body:
Because, even if Riven is going 0/5, she'll never stop playing aggressive.

http://global3.memecdn.com/i-regret-nothing_o_223219.gif

replies.body:
"SHY" vana

Honestly, idk if he planned the ship because they both have the same line of skins (championship)

supposedly it's because they're both outcasts, both warrior minded, and have similar personalities.

I like the majority of people believe J4 is better for Shyvana because he can make her grow unlike Riven who would cause a much slower growth out of her shell plus they'd both probably just stagnate or thirst for violence rather than move on.

> [{quoted}](name=Le Lennymlg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=V8IyJzNh,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-10-03T10:22:51.988+0000)
>
> http://static1.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11123/111239784/5266272-4734153-7444720699-qu3cd.gif

Dear lord, it's not just pixels anymore; they're losing FPS now
Persistence is both the greatest strength and flaw of a Riven player.
Am I missing something or is it "Let's attack the riven main" time?

he is one of these weirdos who try to force pair off champions into relationships despite no lore making it so.
he spams the boards with a riven and shyvanna one.

Personally, they are all weirdos imo.
I'm aware of that, but why all of a sudden like 3 threads of it?
you arent the only one who noticed the riven mains ship being bashed, but it needs SOME discipline for not having any lore connections at all, and technically being enemies due to the factions
Does it though? Its all made up anyway, so who cares? Why harass somebody about it?

i was talking about the ship not the person, bro

and im not even the one who posted this thread lel
You're disciplining the SHIP directly? And because you aren't OP I can't disagree with your reasoning?

You act like I am OP
and if you aren't then you wouldnt of said "Why harass somebody about it?"
Which is also why I said "i was talking about the ship not the person, bro"

lol can you look at what you typed that made me reply for once
What, plunger X eggbeater? Dude that ship sailed LONG ago. There's no stopping it now...
Love beats all I guess... Even if she hurts like a mother*(this segment has been censored by the peoples Republic of China)*
